traits.name: Hold Breath
traits.description: The crocodile can hold its breath for 1 hour.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The crocodile makes one Bite attack and one Tail attack.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +8, reach 5 ft. Hit: 21 (3d10 + 5) Piercing damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the Grappled condition (escape DC 15). While Grappled, the target has the Restrained condition and can’t be targeted by the crocodile’s Tail.

actions.name: Tail
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +8, reach 10 ft. Hit: 18 (3d8 + 5) Bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the Prone condition.
